questions.text: What is the coefficient of x in the expression 5x + 3?
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: The expression x² - 9 can be factored as (x+3)(x-3).
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: This is a difference of squares: a² - b² = (a+b)(a-b)

questions.text: What is the degree of the polynomial 4x³ + 2x² - x + 7?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: The degree is the highest power of x, which is 3.

questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: (x + 2)² = x² + 4x + 4, not x² + 4

questions.text: x² + 4 can be factored using real numbers.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Sum of squares cannot be factored with real numbers. Only difference of squares (x² - 4) can.

questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: Factor completely: 2x² + 8x
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Factor out the GCF, which is 2x: 2x² + 8x = 2x(x + 4)

questions.text: The expression 4x² - 12x + 9 is a perfect square trinomial.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: 4x² - 12x + 9 = (2x - 3)², which is a perfect square trinomial.

questions.text: What is the leading coefficient of the polynomial 6x⁴ - 3x³ + x - 2?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: The leading coefficient is the coefficient of the term with the highest degree (6x⁴).

questions.text: Factor: x² - 16
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Difference of squares: x² - 16 = x² - 4² = (x + 4)(x - 4)

questions.text: Match each polynomial to its number of terms.
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: Simplify: 4x² + 3x - 2x² + 5x - 1
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Combine like terms: (4x² - 2x²) + (3x + 5x) - 1 = 2x² + 8x - 1

questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: The expression 3(x + 2) - 2(x - 1) simplifies to x + 8.
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: Factor: x² + 8x + 16
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: x² + 8x + 16 is a perfect square trinomial: (x + 4)²

questions.text: The expression 9x² - 25 is a difference of squares.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: 9x² - 25 = (3x)² - 5² is a difference of squares: (3x + 5)(3x - 5)

questions.text: Factor: 3x² - 12
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: First factor out GCF: 3(x² - 4), then factor difference of squares: 3(x + 2)(x - 2)

questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: The expression x² - 2x - 8 factors to (x - 4)(x + 2).
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Find two numbers that multiply to -8 and add to -2: -4 and 2

questions.text: Factor: 2x² + 5x + 3
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Using AC method or trial: 2x² + 5x + 3 = (2x + 3)(x + 1)

questions.text: Expand: (3x + 2)(3x - 2)
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: This is a difference of squares pattern: (a + b)(a - b) = a² - b² = 9x² - 4

questions.text: In the expression 4x³ - 2x² + x - 5, the coefficient of x² is 2.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: The coefficient of x² is -2, not 2.

questions.explanation: (2x)³ = 2³ · x³ = 8x³

questions.text: The expression x² - 6x + 9 equals (x - 3)².
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: x² - 6x + 9 is a perfect square trinomial: (x - 3)² = x² - 6x + 9

questions.text: Factor: x³ + 2x² - 3x
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Factor out x first: x(x² + 2x - 3), then factor trinomial: x(x + 3)(x - 1)

questions.text: The GCF of 6x³ + 9x² - 12x is 3x.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: GCF of 6, 9, 12 is 3, and the lowest power of x is x¹, so GCF is 3x.

questions.text: Factor: 4x² - 25
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Difference of squares: 4x² - 25 = (2x)² - 5² = (2x + 5)(2x - 5)

questions.text: Which expression represents the area of a square with side length (x + 3)?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Area = side² = (x + 3)² = x² + 6x + 9

questions.text: Match the equivalent expressions.

questions.text: Simplify: 5x(x + 2) - 3x²
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: Factor: x² - 10x + 25
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Perfect square trinomial: x² - 10x + 25 = (x - 5)²

questions.text: If x² + bx + 16 is a perfect square trinomial, then b = 8 or b = -8.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: For x² + bx + 16 to be a perfect square, 16 = (b/2)², so b/2 = ±4, meaning b = 8 or b = -8.

questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Difference of squares: x² - 49 = x² - 7² = (x + 7)(x - 7)

questions.explanation: (x + 3)² = x² + 6x + 9, not x² + 9

questions.text: The expression 25x² - 30x + 9 is a perfect square trinomial.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: 25x² - 30x + 9 = (5x - 3)², which is a perfect square trinomial.

questions.text: What is the GCF of 12x⁴ + 18x³ - 24x²?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: GCF of 12, 18, 24 is 6, and the lowest power of x is x², so GCF is 6x²

questions.explanation: Find two numbers that multiply to -21 and add to -4: -7 and 3

questions.text: What is the degree of the polynomial 5x²y³ + 2xy - 7?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: The degree is the highest sum of exponents in any term: 2 + 3 = 5 for x²y³

questions.text: Factor: 3x² + 10x + 8
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Using AC method: 3·8 = 24, factors that add to 10: 6 and 4. Split: 3x² + 6x + 4x + 8 = (3x + 4)(x + 2)

questions.text: The expression 1/x is a polynomial.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Polynomials cannot have variables in the denominator or negative exponents.

questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: (3x²)² = 3² · (x²)² = 9x⁴

questions.text: Every quadratic expression can be factored using integers.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Some quadratics like x² + x + 1 cannot be factored using integers (prime polynomials).

questions.text: Factor: 16x² - 81
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Difference of squares: 16x² - 81 = (4x)² - 9² = (4x + 9)(4x - 9)

questions.text: The expression x³ - 8 can be factored as (x - 2)(x² + 2x + 4).
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: This is the difference of cubes formula: a³ - b³ = (a - b)(a² + ab + b²)

questions.text: How many terms are in the expression (x + 1)(x + 2)(x + 3) when fully expanded?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Expanding gives x³ + 6x² + 11x + 6, which has 4 terms.

questions.text: The binomial x + 5 is a factor of x² + 3x - 10.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: x² + 3x - 10 = (x + 5)(x - 2), so x + 5 is indeed a factor.

questions.explanation: Using AC method or trial: 2x² - 7x + 3 = (2x - 1)(x - 3)

questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: If x² - kx + 9 is a perfect square, then k = 6.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: For x² - kx + 9 to be a perfect square (x - 3)², we need k = 6. But (x + 3)² = x² + 6x + 9 means k could also be -6.

questions.text: What expression represents the perimeter of a rectangle with length (2x + 3) and width (x - 1)?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Perimeter = 2(length + width) = 2[(2x + 3) + (x - 1)] = 2(3x + 2) = 6x + 4

questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: The expression (x + a)(x + b) expands to x² + (a+b)x + ab.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: This is the general pattern for factoring simple trinomials.

questions.text: What is the coefficient of x in the expansion of (x + 5)(x - 3)?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: (x + 5)(x - 3) = x² - 3x + 5x - 15 = x² + 2x - 15, so coefficient of x is 2

questions.text: Arrange the steps to solve for the zeros of f(x) = x² - 5x + 6 by factoring.

draggableItems: Set each factor equal to zero

questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: Factor: 4x² + 12x + 9
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Perfect square trinomial: 4x² + 12x + 9 = (2x)² + 2(2x)(3) + 3² = (2x + 3)²

questions.text: The expression x³ + 27 is a sum of cubes and can be factored.
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: x³ + 27 = x³ + 3³ = (x + 3)(x² - 3x + 9) using a³ + b³ = (a + b)(a² - ab + b²)

questions.text: Match the rewritten form to its purpose.
questions.subject: Mathematics

questions.text: What is the simplified form of (x + 2)² - (x - 2)²?
questions.subject: Mathematics
questions.explanation: Using difference of squares: (x+2)² - (x-2)² = [(x+2)+(x-2)][(x+2)-(x-2)] = (2x)(4) = 8x
